headline: Everest Group Report Highlights the Growing Role of Intelligent Document Processing in Modernizing Public Sector Service Delivery
summary: IRVING, Texas, Feb. 18, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- XBP Global Holdings, Inc. (“XBP Global” or “the Company”) (NASDAQ: XBP), a workflow automation leader that leverages decades of industry experience, a global footprint, and agentic AI to rethink business process automation and digital transformation, presents a new report from Everest Group, supported by XBP Global. Public sector organizations worldwide are accelerating the adoption of Intelligent Document Processing (“IDP”) to improve service del
